name: codex
description: Full-stack TypeScript application with NestJS and Next.js

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules shared/node_modules backend/dist frontend/.next shared/dist
